name: My Life (Nathan Yang)
description:
Hi

I think games are a perfect medium to allow players to interact with the story and better allow others to experience the emotions you want to express.

Idea

Human life is winding, you will always encounter various obstacles and low points on this long road. But from the moment people are born, biologically our end is already predetermined.

Through this game, understanding my life or the lives of millions of people, perhaps we can find common ground.

Life is good, please enjoy the moment, and good luck in the future.
